visual_enhancers.gradients: Subtle top-down fade for hero sections (Emerald-50 to Transparent)
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid zinc-200 for structure, Emerald-500 for active states
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-xl for cards, rounded-lg for inputs/buttons

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 ratio for all text. Use Emerald-800 for text on light backgrounds.
accessibility.bilingual: English and Hindi text should be visually distinct (e.g., Hindi slightly larger or bolder if needed).

hero_login.alt: Young cow grazing in lush green field
hero_login.usage: Login page background or Hero banner

milk_collection.alt: Farmer milking cow into clay pot
milk_collection.usage: Collection module header or empty state

image_assets.logo_placeholder: Use a vector cow head icon or milk drop icon in Emerald-700

3d_libraries.usage: Minimal. Use simple CSS animations or Framer Motion for transitions. No heavy 3D for this rural app context to ensure performance on low-end devices.

instructions_to_main_agent: Prioritize Mobile Experience: 80% of users will use this on phones.
Bilingual First: Every major label must show Hindi text. Use 'English (Hindi)' format.
Offline Friendly UI: Design clear 'Syncing' or 'Offline' indicators.
Data Density: In the 'Ledger' and 'Collection' tables, keep rows compact but readable.
Input Focus: When entering milk data, the number pad should be easily accessible.
Use 'recharts' or Shadcn charts for the milk collection graphs.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) only for overlays/modals.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; }.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤– etc.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a data-testid attribute.
